bottledair-fabric.duskconfig.title: Bottled Air Config
bottledair-fabric.duskconfig.DESC_disabl: If enabled, players will be unable to drink water bottles underwater to prevent getting unlimited oxygen.
bottledair-fabric.duskconfig.DESC_holdFi: Whether the creation of water bottles should be prevented (evaporated) when holding a fire type block in the offhand.
bottledair-fabric.duskconfig.holdFireTyp: Hold Fire Type Item In Offhand To Prevent Water Bottle Creation
bottledair-fabric.duskconfig.DESC_chance: The chance a glass bottle breaks when the item in the offhand evaporates the water, giving back an empty (air) bottle.
bottledair-fabric.duskconfig.chanceGlass: Chance Glass Bottle Breaks With Fire Type In Offhand
bottledair-fabric.duskconfig.DESC_amount: The amount of air an empty bottle contains. In vanilla Minecraft, 300 is the maximum air supply.
